title: fortunecrypto
author: fortunecrypto
content: This is in reference to a newbie thread in the gambling section about his list of casinos  that surprisingly are not on this forum, there are too many of them some of them are already running 5 to 20 years already.So I would like to ask are you playing in casinos that are not on this forum, if so what are these casinos and how's your experience can you recommend them here, can you name your own list

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: In my case it would be fiat casinos but I only play occasionally just like going to land based casinos. I know that what you are looking for are casinos that accept cryptocurrency deposits but with the number of cryptocurrency casinos that are advertised on the forum, I don't think you are going to make a very long list with those that are not known on the forum.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: No, I've never played at a casino that doesn't have an ann thread on the forum, in fact most of me know about the casino from the activity on this forum. But it can't be denied that there are so many online casinos and many don't have an ann thread on the forum so when someone plays other than the well-known on this forum it becomes a question for many members of this forum but actually it's a normal thing as long as the casino pays

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Personally for a crypto casino then definitely refer to this forum and make reputation the most important part. However, for some online casinos with fiat, I use the casinos available in the country. Although it's not often there now, for the reason that for me crypto casinos have a more global level of fairness than fiat casinos. So far I have not found any casinos that accept unknown cryptocurrency deposits on the forums.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Being here for years and only read articles related to the cryptocurrency, some users may have disconnected themselves to the fiat base casino they've been with. I wouldn't name the casino but its only an app in the phone for the locals in my country which I think is understandably why they were not here.Once these casinos I guess considers adopting BTC, they will start finding where the best to promote for BTC users.Â  Where these will lead them is of course Bitcointalk.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on July 26, 2022, 04:00:42 AMSo I would like to ask are you playing in casinos that are not on this forum, if so what are these casinos and how's your experience can you recommend them here, can you name your own list The only casino that I can remember that I saw on a prediction site called soccervista like 10 years ago is Cloudbet, I have never used the site before but they also recently got an active campaign on this forum, aside that, all the gambling sites I have used are all fiat based gambling sites, they only accept fiat even up till now. But what that happen is that any gambling site can one day decide to also start to accept bitcoin and other crypto as a means of payment. But the crypto casinos that I know about are all on this forum.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: I don't play at casinos that aren't on this forum because I don't want to risk anything bad going on.If I was playing at a casino out of this forum and it turned out to something that I do not want to, I don't know what I would do.Maybe I could have reported it to Customer Support at the casino but either it will be responded to or will be left alone.But if the casino is on this forum, I can contact their representative to report my problem in addition to contacting their Customer Support.

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: I only play on casinos that I'm familiar with and with active support here so if every I have an issue I can post it in their announcement thread or create a discussion for my issue since they have an announcement here they will be oblige to answer my issues, its very different when you are at the mercy of the casino, where they will answer when they want to, not when they have too, if they have support here they can't ignore your issue.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.created_time: July 26, 2022, 09:20:03 AMLast edit: July 26, 2022, 09:38:24 AM by coin-investor
comments.body: So far all the casinos I've played and currently playing have active support and announcement here, it's advantageous to you because in case you have an issue you have the whole community to read and judge your issue, it's actually a win-win situation for both players and casino operators, by making the issue in public the gambler's issue can fast-track the answer to all his questions and for the operators, they can show the community how they resolve the issue so they are gaining trust on their system.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on July 26, 2022, 04:00:42 AMThis is in reference to a newbie thread in the gambling section about his list of casinos  that surprisingly are not on this forum, there are too many of them some of them are already running 5 to 20 years already.So I would like to ask are you playing in casinos that are not on this forum, if so what are these casinos and how's your experience can you recommend them here, can you name your own list I don't play on the casinos that don't promote their services on this forum. It is a safety thing. When you get scammed by a casino which don't have any representatives here, then your complaints won't have any effect on the casino. They'll just ignore you. If they have any accounts on this forum, then it is a whole different story. You can raise a crowd and force them to fix their mistake. If they don't, then they'll get lots of red tags and flags which is going to make them lose customers.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: I'm playing on casinos that have their announcement and active support here, two things, these casinos keep this forum active and pay advertisement and signature campaigns here, they support the community where I belong and make an income, second in case of an issue I can easily reach the support, helping me resolve my issue and if I have a case I have the community to support me, I'm in a better position playing in casinos with the announcement here.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: As long as I'm on the forum I've never played outside casinos even though it accepts other crypto I don't have any experience other than in the casino forums, it's too comfortable for me here and can see various user reviews directly from outside casinos so I no experience whatsoever.I know that there are also many casinos out there that have good experiences giving good reviews but for me it still doesn't bother me to play it because it's too cool here.By far the more reliable forum casino we can trust as long as I'm still playing and no problems.

comments.author: madnessteat
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on July 26, 2022, 09:45:14 AMI'm playing on casinos that have their announcement and active support here, two things, these casinos keep this forum active and pay advertisement and signature campaigns here, they support the community where I belong and make an income, second in case of an issue I can easily reach the support, helping me resolve my issue and if I have a case I have the community to support me, I'm in a better position playing in casinos with the announcement here.Indeed, many forum users prefer to play in the casinos that have their own threads on the forum but not all are able to play only on these gambling sites for completely different reasons - age, the requirement to pass the KYC, a ban on the game for citizens of certain jurisdictions, etc. Some people are only interested in land-based gambling sites. And it's good that we always have a choice.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: I can't recall the name of the fiat casino that I once tried. So I did play on it, but when I was about to withdraw, they ask for pertaining documents, KYC in short. So I just decided to play everything, it was just like $100 or so winnings though, so instead of sending my docs and whatnot. Just play and lose everything as I don't want to be KYC'ed, simple as that. After that I never ever try to play on fiat based casinos anymore.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Whether interested or not, gambling outside of the forum threads doesn't make me 100% sure because of the lack of relevant information. For example, the casino is not registered on this forum and it turns out to provide crypto for deposits instead I will try to use a search engine on the forum whether the name of the casino was here or not. If I don't find it then I personally have a little suspicion that the casino is a shady casino.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: fortunecrypto on July 26, 2022, 04:00:42 AMSo I would like to ask are you playing in casinos that are not on this forum, if so what are these casinos and how's your experience can you recommend them here, can you name your own list  I am very familiar withÂ  many online sports betting sites that are not on this forum because i use their services even before becoming a member on btt, however for casino's, I started while joining this forum and have only played on those that i have promoted currently Livecasino which is pretty awesome. I'd advice forum members that love casino to as much as possible try to play and use the services of those casino's here with good records and no scam accusations. If you currently play on a casino not here and not known by many please i'd advice you to switch up real quick to avoid being a victim in case of any future occurrence.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Jody.Drummer on July 26, 2022, 10:45:12 AMWhether interested or not, gambling outside of the forum threads doesn't make me 100% sure because of the lack of relevant information. For example, the casino is not registered on this forum and it turns out to provide crypto for deposits instead I will try to use a search engine on the forum whether the name of the casino was here or not. If I don't find it then I personally have a little suspicion that the casino is a shady casino.You have to check that thread My list of good crypto casinos where this thread is linking some of them are already more than 20 years in operation now you have to check the fact if they are shady so you can confirm your suspicion, Casinos should not be judged because they don't have a thread here, but it's ok to prefer casinos that are active here because we are familiar and they communicate to the community and the gambling community are more comfortable playing on these casinos.Familiarity really makes an impact on our choice.

comments.author: karabiber
comments.body: I prefer physical casinos over online casinos. When i gamble online, i get the feeling that i am playing a computer game. I like the atmosphere of physical casinos. I feel more comfortable. That's why physical casinos are my preference. Here the food is good, the service is good, but there is a downside. Due to the atmosphere, your excitement and adrenaline rate is constantly high, which causes you to make ridiculous decisions.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I played a lot of times in physical casinos but never online which is not on this forum. This is where I only discovered I could do it in a different way even before the pandemic. Although, I am still looking forward to going back to playing in a physical one, well when it's 100 percent safe. The thing is, once you found a reputable one you will never look for another unless the game you are looking for is not on their site. The same for deposit options that they offer, if the option you prefer is not listed then I'll just look for another gambling site here on the forum too.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: karabiber on July 26, 2022, 12:56:05 PMI prefer physical casinos over online casinos. When i gamble online, i get the feeling that i am playing a computer game. I like the atmosphere of physical casinos. I feel more comfortable. That's why physical casinos are my preference. Here the food is good, the service is good, but there is a downside. Due to the atmosphere, your excitement and adrenaline rate is constantly high, which causes you to make ridiculous decisions.The topic here are casinos that donât have ANN thread in the forum which means online casino and not the physical one. I donât see the point for a physical to advertise here because most of them is IRL while the forum user preferred online casinos.In my personal experience, I play some of this unlisted casino here in the past but with minimal amount only, My got stuck and support is not responding. After that I didnât risk playing anymore on online casino that has no good reputation here. Better safe than sorry even some of them offers a very good bonus that is hard to resist.
